unlinkedwikibase-desc: Access Wikibase entity data from wikis that are not linked to a Wikibase site.
unlinkedwikibase-error-invalid-id: ID '$1' is not in the required format of an integer prefixed with 'Q'.
unlinkedwikibase-special-no-jobs: The [[mw:Object cache#WAN_cache|site cache]] is not configured for use of the job queue to fetch data, so pages using UnlinkedWikibase may load slowly.
